text: garaz yoosuph ko jab ye log le gae aur is par ittefaaq kar liya ki usako andhe kuen mein daal den aur (aakhir ye log guzare to) hamane yusuf ke paas vahee bhejee ki tum ghabarao nahin ham anaqareeb tumhen maratabe (unche makaam) par pahunchaege (tab tum) unake us phel (bad) se tambeeh (aagaah) karoge
